GetRGB.description: DCOLORCUBE [Client] Returns the color cube's current set color.

OnUserChanged.description:
DCOLORCUBE [Client] Function which is called when the color cube slider is moved (through user input). Meant to be overridden.

[table] color
  The new color, uses Color structure.

SetBaseRGB.description:
DCOLORCUBE [Client] Sets the base color and the color used to draw the color cube panel itself.

[table] color
  The base color to set, uses Color structure.

SetColor.description:
DCOLORCUBE [Client] Sets the base color of the color cube and updates the slider position.

[table] color
  The color to set, uses Color structure.

TranslateValues.description:
DCOLORCUBE [Client] 

[number] x
  The x position to sample color from/the percentage of saturation to remove from the color (ranges from 0.0 to 1.0).

[number] y
  The y position to sample color from/the percentage of brightness or value to remove from the color (ranges from 0.0 to 1.0).

UpdateColor.description:
DCOLORCUBE [Client] 

[number] x=nil
  The x position to set color to/the percentage of saturation to remove from the color (ranges from 0.0 to 1.0).

[number] y=nil
  The y position to set color to/the percentage of brightness or value to remove from the color (ranges from 0.0 to 1.0).
